p: In conclusion, the COVID‐19 epidemic is undoubtedly a profound global health emergency, but people worldwide are courageous and need to be brave to fight this battle. Here, we provide available recommendations for the alternative transitional treatment and management of common treatment‐related adverse events for lung cancer patients at different stages during the epidemic. The war against the COVID‐19 epidemic will eventually be won, and we are willing to work with cancer patients to overcome the challenges!
